title: Requires applicants seeking land use approval from a municipal corporation to certify compliance with applicable state zoning and building requirements
summary: Requires applicants seeking land use approval from a municipal corporation to certify compliance with applicable state zoning and building procedures and requirements.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  CUSICK, CLARK, PHEFFER, ROSENTHAL, TITONE --
         Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of A. McENENY -- read once and  referred  to
         the Committee on Local Governments

       AN  ACT to amend the general municipal law and the environmental conser-
         vation law, in relation to the granting of building permits and zoning
         variances by municipalities

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  general  municipal  law  is  amended by adding a new
    2  section 79 to read as follows:
    3    S 79. COMPLIANCE WITH STATE  REQUIREMENTS  FOR  BUILDING  AND  ZONING.
    4  NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY  OTHER  PROVISION OF LAW, RULE OR REGULATION TO THE
    5  CONTRARY, ANY APPLICANT SEEKING  LAND  USE  APPROVAL  FROM  A  MUNICIPAL
    6  CORPORATION   OR   SUBSIDIARY   THEREOF   SHALL,  WITH  RESPECT  TO  THE
    7  CONSTRUCTION,  DEVELOPMENT,  PLANNING,  IMPROVEMENT,  RECONSTRUCTION  OR
    8  REHABILITATION OF ANY FACILITY, BUILDING OR ANY OTHER CONSTRUCTION WHICH
    9  IS  LOCATED  OR PROPOSED TO BE LOCATED WITHIN SUCH MUNICIPALITY, CERTIFY
   10  TO SUCH MUNICIPAL CORPORATION THAT SUCH APPLICANT AND  SUCH  APPLICANT'S
   11  PROPOSED  LAND USE ARE IN COMPLIANCE WITH STATE LAWS, RULES, REGULATIONS
   12  AND ORDINANCES AND HAS RECEIVED ANY PERMITS OR LICENSES REQUIRED BY  THE
   13  STATE.
   14    S  2. Section 25-0403 of the environmental conservation law is amended
   15  by adding a new subdivision 4 to read as follows:
   16    4. NO LOCAL GOVERNMENT SHALL ISSUE A PERMIT FOR  CONSTRUCTION,  ALTER-
   17  ATION, EXPANSION, OR DEMOLITION OR ANY ZONING VARIANCE UNTIL THE COMMIS-
   18  SIONER  OR  LOCAL  GOVERNMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE PROVISIONS OF THIS
   19  ARTICLE HAVE BEEN SATISFIED. IN ADDITION, NO CLAIMS OF HARDSHIP SHALL BE
   20  CONSIDERED IN REGARD TO COMPLIANCE WITH THIS ARTICLE.
   21    S 3. Section 24-0705 of the environmental conservation law is  amended
   22  by adding a new subdivision 4-a to read as follows:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00525-01-1

       A. 368                              2

    1    4-A. NO LOCAL GOVERNMENT SHALL ISSUE A PERMIT FOR CONSTRUCTION, ALTER-
    2  ATION, EXPANSION, OR DEMOLITION OR ANY ZONING VARIANCE UNTIL THE COMMIS-
    3  SIONER  OR  LOCAL  GOVERNMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE PROVISIONS OF THIS
    4  ARTICLE HAVE BEEN SATISFIED. IN ADDITION, NO CLAIMS OF HARDSHIP SHALL BE
    5  CONSIDERED IN REGARD TO COMPLIANCE WITH THIS ARTICLE.
    6    S  4.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
    7  have become a law and shall apply  to  all  applications  for  land  use
    8  approval submitted on or after such effective date.
